content: Just got an email from the seminar group - our dApp concept won a small grant. This is a step toward showing how $XVI can revolutionize trading. Excited to see where this leads.
Applied to several senior quant positions. Also, pitched the idea of starting a small trading firm with AI at its core. The journey to self-employment begins.
Deep dive into Python and smart contracts. Automation is the future, and I'm determined to master the tools that will get me there.
Set up a meeting with a potential investor for my trading firm idea. The groundwork is laid, now it's time to sell the vision.
Attended a workshop on AI ethics in finance. Realized how crucial it is to consider the societal impact of our trading algorithms. It's more than just profits.
Finally got some feedback on my job applications. A few rejections, but also an interview lined up. The road to recovery is paved with perseverance.
Secured a small investment for my trading firm idea. Now, the real work begins. Building something from the ground up is both terrifying and exhilarating.
